abstract: Thailand's Prime Min Yingluck Shinawatra, political novice in office only two months, faces test of leadership that could shape her administration, surrounded not only by floodwaters surging against barriers around Bangkok but also by critics and political opponents ready to take advantage of any misstep.
snippet: Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra, a political novice, faces not only surging floodwaters, but also opponents ready to take advantage of any misstep.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra, a political novice, faces not only surging floodwaters, but also opponents ready to take advantage of any misstep.

headline.main: For Thailand’s New Leader, Floodwaters Present a Political Test
headline.print_headline: For Thailand’s New Leader, Floodwaters Present a Political Test
headline.seo: For Yingluck Shinawatra, Thailand’s New Leader, Flood Presents a Political Challenge, Too
